org.webcurator.core.util
Class WCTSoapCall

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.util.WCTSoapCall

public class WCTSoapCall
extends java.lang.Object

WCTSoapCall abstracts some of the SOAP mechanics from the rest of the WCT, allowing the WCT to be relatively free of SOAP related functionality. This class should be used for all SOAP calls between the core, harvest agents, and digital asset store.

Author:
bbeaumont

WCTSoapCall

public WCTSoapCall(java.lang.String host,
                   java.lang.String service,
                   java.lang.String operation)
            throws javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException
Create a new SOAP call.

Parameters:
host - The host to send the message to.
service - The name of the service to send the message to.
operation - The operation to invoke.
Throws:
javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException - if there is a SOAP error.

public WCTSoapCall(java.lang.String host,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String service,
                   java.lang.String operation)
            throws javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException
Create a new SOAP call.

Parameters:
host - The host to send the message to.
port - The port the end point is listening on.
service - The name of the service to send the message to.
operation - The operation to invoke.
Throws:
javax.xml.rpc.ServiceException - if there is a SOAP error.

retryingInvoke

public java.lang.Object retryingInvoke(int attempts,
                                       long retryDelay,
                                       java.lang.Object... objects)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Invoke the SOAP call.

Parameters:
attempts - The number of attempts to make. Set to 0 for infinite.
retryDelay - The number of milliseconds to wait between attempts.
objects - The operation's arguments.
Returns:
The return value of the SOAP call.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if there are any exceptions.
